fields.label: Content blocks
fields.name: content_blocks
fields.instructions: Select the layout you would like to add then customize it's options with your content.

sub_fields.label: Choose layout
sub_fields.name: layout
sub_fields.instructions: Choose the layout for the content.

choices.offset: Alternating content / image with background tint

sub_fields.label: Content alignment options
sub_fields.name: default_align
sub_fields.instructions: Adjusts the alignment of content for the default layout.

choices.full_col_content: Full width column, content divided into two columns

sub_fields.label: Flip layout
sub_fields.name: flip
sub_fields.instructions: For layouts that support it, changes the order of the image and the content. Default is content on the left, image on the right.

sub_fields.label: Headline tag
sub_fields.name: headline_tag
sub_fields.instructions: What HTML tag should the primary title in the section use ( ie h1 - h6 )? There should only be one H1 tag per page.

sub_fields.label: Image
sub_fields.name: image
sub_fields.instructions: The default image, shows up to the large device size ( landscape tablets ) break point. To be ADA compliant the image MUST have an alt tag entered.

sub_fields.label: Image for large devices and higher
sub_fields.name: image_lg
sub_fields.instructions: Image that will show on large device size break point and higher.

sub_fields.label: Additional CSS classes
sub_fields.name: developer_styles
sub_fields.instructions: Add CSS classes to the section.

sub_fields.label: Background image
sub_fields.name: s-block-bg__bg-img
sub_fields.instructions: The background image of the section, will appear transparent with the background color visible.

sub_fields.label: Heading tag
sub_fields.name: heading-tag
sub_fields.instructions: What tag should the primary title in the section use ( ie h1 - h5 )? There should only be one H1 tag per page.

sub_fields.label: Headline class
sub_fields.name: heading-class
sub_fields.instructions: Add additional CSS classes to the headline. To style a div tag line a headline use h1 - h6 here.

sub_fields.label: Review rating
sub_fields.name: review_rating
sub_fields.instructions: If applicable, what was the rating received? Leave blank if there is no rating.

sub_fields.label: Review maximum
sub_fields.name: review_max
sub_fields.instructions: What is the maximum review score?

sub_fields.label: Link text
sub_fields.name: s-block-bg__link-txt
sub_fields.instructions: The text of the link that appears below the content, i.e. "Read More".

sub_fields.label: Additional CSS classes
sub_fields.name: developer_styles
sub_fields.instructions: Add CSS classes to the section.

sub_fields.label: Image or embed code?
sub_fields.name: image_or_embed_code
sub_fields.instructions: Is the badge an image or a snip of code?

sub_fields.label: Attorney badge or award retina image
sub_fields.name: badges-img_2x

sub_fields.label: Attorney badge or award embed code
sub_fields.name: badges-code
